dn30:2.20.6: Abhejjapariso hoti, abhejjassa honti parisa, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo deva manussa asura naga gandhabba.
dn30:2.22.1: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathagato purimam jatim purimam bhavam purimam niketam pubbe manussabhuto samano
dn30:2.22.2: pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato ahosi. Ya sa vaca nela kannasukha pemaniya hadayangama pori bahujanakanta bahujanamanapa, tatharupim vacam bhasita ahosi.
dn30:2.22.4: so tato cuto itthattam agato samano imani dve mahapurisalakkhanani patilabhati.
dn30:2.22.5: Pahutajivho ca hoti brahmassaro ca karavikabhani.
dn30:2.23.1: So tehi lakkhanehi samannagato sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti …pe…
dn30:2.23.3: Adeyyavaco hoti, adiyantissa vacanam brahmanagahapatika negamajanapada ganakamahamatta anikattha dovarika amacca parisajja rajano bhogiya kumara.
dn30:2.23.6: Adeyyavaco hoti, adiyantissa vacanam bhikkhu bhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo deva manussa asura naga gandhabba.
dn30:2.24.4: Abalham giram so na bhani pharusam,
dn30:2.25.1: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathagato purimam jatim purimam bhavam purimam niketam pubbe manussabhuto samano
dn30:2.25.2: samphappalapam pahaya samphappalapa pativirato ahosi kalavadi bhutavadi atthavadi dhammavadi vinayavadi, nidhanavatim vacam bhasita ahosi kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam.
dn30:2.25.4: so tato cuto itthattam agato samano imam mahapurisalakkhanam patilabhati,
dn30:2.26.1: So tena lakkhanena samannagato sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti …pe…
dn30:2.26.3: Appadhamsiyo hoti kenaci manussabhutena paccatthikena paccamittena.
dn30:2.26.6: Appadhamsiyo hoti abbhantarehi va bahirehi va paccatthikehi paccamittehi, ragena va dosena va mohena va samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
dn30:2.27.17: Idha disa ca patidisa ca vidisa ca”ti.
dn30:2.28.1: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathagato purimam jatim purimam bhavam purimam niketam pubbe manussabhuto samano
dn30:2.28.2: micchajivam pahaya sammaajivena jivikam kappesi, tulakutakamsakutamanakutaukkotanavancananikatisaciyogachedanavadhabandhanaviparamosaalopasahasakara pativirato ahosi.
dn30:2.28.3: So tassa kammassa katatta upacitatta ussannatta vipulatta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
dn30:2.28.4: So tattha anne deve dasahi thanehi adhiganhati dibbena ayuna dibbena vannena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena adhipateyyena dibbehi rupehi dibbehi saddehi dibbehi gandhehi dibbehi rasehi dibbehi photthabbehi.
dn30:2.28.5: So tato cuto itthattam agato samano imani dve mahapurisalakkhanani patilabhati, samadanto ca hoti susukkadatho ca.
dn30:2.29.1: So tehi lakkhanehi samannagato sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
dn30:2.29.3: cakkaratanam hatthiratanam assaratanam maniratanam itthiratanam gahapatiratanam parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
dn30:2.29.4: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
dn30:2.29.5: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam akhilamanimittamakantakam iddham phitam khemam sivam nirabbudam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
dn30:2.29.7: Suciparivaro hoti sucissa honti parivara brahmanagahapatika negamajanapada ganakamahamatta anikattha dovarika amacca parisajja rajano bhogiya kumara.
dn30:2.30.1: Sace kho pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivattacchado.
dn30:2.30.3: Suciparivaro hoti, sucissa honti parivara, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo deva manussa asura naga gandhabba.
dn30:2.31.25: Imamapi ca paramapi ca passati lokam.
dn30:2.31.31: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
